room_title: Escape room "Lost In Time" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: I went with my coworkers as a team building night out and we all had a blast! We had a group of 7 and did Lost in Time. The puzzle were great and it was interesting seeing each of our strengths outside of work. We worked with Amber and she was sweet and accommodating. They are lucky to have such a nice person working there.Thank you for a fun and brain-bending night out. My team needed this!

room_title: Escape room "Lost In Time" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: We - my husband, brother, sister-in-law, and I have been several times now and we absolutely love it! My husband and I have escaped two of the four rooms, Lost in Time and Bankheist and had a blast in doing so. We will definitely be back again!

room_title: Escape room "Lost In Time" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: Absolutely fun. The staff was great and informative. We did "Lost in Time" and will definitely be coming back to do the other rooms. Such a blast.
